## **Description**
The **Split **operator allows to extract a value (based on the configuration settings) from an input string containing multiple values separated by a character separator.

## **Input**
**Input**

**Data type**

**Description**

**in0**

String

The string, containing a series of values separated by a character separator, from which you want to extract a particular value

## **Output**
**Output**

**Data type**

**Description**

**out0**

String

The value of the string found in the position defined in the configuration settings

## **![](data:image/png;base64,)****Settings**
- In the **Split character **text field, type the character separator used to separate the values in the string.

- In the **Elements **text field, type the position (number) of the value that you want to extract within the input string.

- Click **Apply **to confirm..

## **Special cases**
In special cases, the operator behaves as follows:

**Case**

**Behavior**

**NULL input (no input)**

The operator considers a NULL input as an empty string. The system logs a warning event.

**Input with NULL value**

The operator considers an input with NULL value as an empty string. The system logs a warning event.
